directions: [["In a sauce pan, combine sugar, flour, 1/2 teaspoon salt (per recipe), pineapple juice, and eggs. Stir and cook over medium heat until thickened. Remove from heat; add lemon juice and cool to room temperature."],["Bring water to a boil; add oil and remaining salt. Cook pasta until al dente. Drain and rinse under cold water."],["In a large bowl, combine the pasta, egg mixture, mandarin oranges, pineapple, and whipped topping. Mix well and refrigerate overnight or until chilled. Before serving add marshmallows. Toss and serve."],[""],[""],[""],[""],[""],[""],[""]]
